name: ADEEL-MD
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot made by ADEEL-MD

PREFIX.description: Paste your bot prefix. Don't use null prefix.

MODE.description: Select bot mode: public, private, inbox, or group.

ANTI_DELETE.description: Set true to show deleted messages.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Set true to keep bot always online.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Set true for automatic text replies.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Set true for automatic sticker conversion.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Set true for automatic status viewing.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Set true for automatic status reactions.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Set true for automatic status replies.

ANTI_LINK.description: True to delete links and kick members.

DELETE_LINKS.description: True to only delete links without kicking members.

ANTI_BAD.description: Set true to delete messages with bad words.

MENTION_REPLY.description: Set true for automatic reply when mentioned.

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: URL for menu and mention reply image.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Set true for automatic audio recording status.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Set true for automatic typing status.

AUTO_REACT.description: Set true to react to every message.

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: Resend deleted messages to 'inbox' or 'same' chat.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Set true to automatically mark messages as read.

ANTI_CALL.description: Set true to automatically reject WhatsApp calls.
